==Useful Info==
A [[unique]] [[kobold]], '''Sonja the Graceful Assassin''' usually wields a [[dagger]] or [[short sword]] of [[distortion]], [[venom]], or [[draining]], as well as [[curare]] [[dart]]s. She has exceptional [[EV]] and is faster than average.

==Location==
*[[The Dungeon]]:10-13
*The [[Orcish Mines]]
*[[The Lair]]

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Sonja may be a pest at range, but if she's wielding a distortion dagger, she's absolutely deadly in melee; her speed and three attacks per action mean she delivers 3-6 distortion strikes before most characters can even respond.
*Sonja has very low HP and pathetic [[willpower]], so most disabling [[Hexes]] will stop her easily, as will [[Airstrike]] or other unavoidable spells. Even with low [[Evocations]] skill, a [[wand of mindburst]] or [[wand of paralysis|paralysis]] pretty much guarantees her defeat.
*[[Poison resistance]] will render her darts harmless, but won't do much against her melee attacks.

==History==
*Prior to version [[0.28]], Sonja had [[Teleport Self]].
